lead_paragraph: Swiss officials will decide whether to extradite the film director Roman Polanski to the United States .
snippet: Swiss officials will decide whether to extradite the film director Roman Polanski to the United States .

headline.main: Swiss Await Decision on Polanski Appeal
headline.print_headline: Swiss Await Decision On Polanski Appeal

byline.original: By MICHAEL CIEPLY; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF
